title: Night Watch: Washington From Space + Public Art Spaces
teaser: NIGHT WATCH: WASHINGTON FROM SPACE: We learn what high-resolution satellite images of our metro region at night are telling us about energy use, behavior patterns, and our changing urban landscape. (23 min.) PUBLIC ART SPACES: From a new underground project in Dupont Circle to areas in Hyattsville and Rosslyn, we explore what it takes to create space for the arts. (26 min.)
